name: Ligne Claire Anime
description:
Ligne claire is French for "clear line" and the style focuses on strong lines, flat colors and lack of gradient shading. This is a finetuned text to image model focusing on anime style ligne claire.

Key prompt: ligne claire

The following are also useful depending on the desired style:

flat color, limited palette, low contrast, high contrast, chromatic aberration

Example prompts:

https://gist.github.com/breakcore2/2330a64721d01ec4a5ac6c03b8c6688a

Source:

https://huggingface.co/breakcore2/ligne_claire_anime_diffusion
